name: Create a SendFox contact from new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new subscriber is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add a new contact to SendFox. The template uses [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1DWh6gVFPdGTrI06TIeG0o9zfLnlu24TbDSszqjf7wQA/edit?usp=sharing).
